name: Apple
description: A sweet, crisp fruit that comes in many varieties and colors. Apples are high in fiber and vitamin C.

name: Banana
description: A tropical fruit that is sweet and soft when ripe. Bananas are a great source of potassium.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit known for its juicy, tangy taste and high vitamin C content.

name: Strawberry
description: A bright red, juicy fruit with a sweet flavor. Strawberries are high in antioxidants and vitamin C.

name: Grapes
description: Small, sweet or tart fruits that grow in clusters. Grapes can be eaten fresh or used to make wine.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, red flesh. Watermelons are popular in the summer.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with sweet, juicy flesh and a large pit. Mangoes are rich in vitamins A and C.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, tangy flesh inside.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round berries that are sweet and slightly tart. Blueberries are high in antioxidants.

name: Peach
description: A juicy, sweet fruit with fuzzy skin and a large pit. Peaches are popular in desserts.
